item.title: #108 ã€å…¨ç·¨è‹±èªå›ã€‘The Ai Workforce Team Goes Global: Voices from the Engineers Behind Agentic Workflowsã€ isamisushi Ã— Tim Ã— nrryuya ã€‘
item.description:
In this episode, we delve into LayerXâ€™s bold new challenge of actively recruiting English-speaking engineers, including those who do not speak Japanese.
